subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: At 17-under-par 196, Mike Weir is one stroke clear of Camilo Villegas (63) and three ahead of Sergio García (68) and Vijay Singh (69). in the PGA Tour’s FedEx Cup playoffs.
snippet: At 17-under-par 196, Mike Weir is one stroke clear of Camilo Villegas (63) and three ahead of Sergio García (68) and Vijay Singh (69). in the PGA Tour’s FedEx Cup playoffs.
